name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Highlighter, Eraser, Black out marker and Multi copy tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text in a web page. Copy multiple selections at once. Delete text or images. Black out. Print or save as anonymized pdf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open a web page and activate the extension by clicking its icon. 

- Highlight the meaningful text fragments in a web page.
- Delete the irrelevant text or images from a web page.
- Copy multiple highlighted selections to the clipboard in one click. You do not have to paste into another window each time you select text.
- Black out any private information before printing a web page.
- Print the decorated text or save as a PDF. The highlights are retained during printing. In the PDF the blacked out characters are replaced by question marks.
- You can also cross out or underline text like in Acrobat.

How this tool is different from similar extensions:
- It is simple to use. Its user interface is a toolbar popping up upon text selection. It has no options or settings.
- It is open-source. The code inside is not mangled, you can check it to make sure that it is safe.
- It is free.
